description: The Wolfpack heads to Thailand for another misadventure leading up to a wedding.

title: The Longest Yard
description: A disgraced quarterback leads a team of prisoners in a football game against guards.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
description: CIA and KGB agents team up during the Cold War to stop a global threat.

title: The Marksman
description: A rancher protects a young boy from a drug cartel while on the run.

title: The Other Guys
description: Two mismatched detectives uncover corruption while trying to prove their worth.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of a manipulative killer to catch another murderer.

title: The World Is Not Enough
description: James Bond protects an oil heiress from a vengeful anarchist.

title: Thunderball
description: James Bond battles a villain holding the world hostage with stolen nuclear weapons.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: James Bond battles a media mogul intent on starting a global war for ratings.

title: Wanted
description: A frustrated office worker discovers he's the son of an elite assassin.

title: Wild Hogs
description: A group of middle-aged friends go on a motorcycle road trip and find adventure.

title: Without a Paddle
description: Three childhood friends embark on a wilderness adventure to find lost treasure.

title: You Only Live Twice
description: James Bond investigates a series of space hijackings and uncovers a global conspiracy.

title: Kicking & Screaming
description: A man coaches his son's soccer team while competing with his overbearing father.
